body:
### Kind Sir/Madam

This notice serves to inform you that, prior to asking my question/posting my post/doing what I did which would have (possibly) prompted you to ask me to "Google" or "RTFM":

# I READ THE MANUAL

I GOOGLED IT
---

I HAVE A REASON FOR ASKING __HERE__ 
===

` IF YOU ASK ME TO DO ANY OF THE ABOVE OR SIMILAR, YOU ARE THE MORON. NOT ME
Because you didn't RTFM. `


Thank you.
name: Disclaimer: ia-RTFM
tagline: I Already Read the Funky Manual
